title: Projects
text:
**Featured Innovations**

🔹 **Automated Healthcare Insights Dashboard**
**Tech:** Python, SQL, Tableau
A dynamic dashboard for healthcare providers that **automates patient insights** and **reduces manual reporting time by 50%**.


🔹 **Predictive Financial Risk Model**
**Tech:** R, Python, Databricks
Developed an **AI-driven risk model** for financial decision-making, leading to a **20% reduction in loan defaults**.


🔹 **AI-Powered Grant Application Assistant**
**Tech:** NLP, RAG models, AI-assisted processing
Building an **AI assistant** that helps nonprofits **craft stronger grant applications**.
📌 More projects coming soon! Stay tuned.
🔗 [Read My Insights](blog.qmd)

title: Jorge Montoya
text:
🔍 Bridging technology and business strategy to drive success

Welcome! I’m an Analytics & Innovation Leader specializing in data-driven strategy, automation, and AI-powered analytics in healthcare and finance. I thrive on turning complex data into strategic insights.





💡 Developing predictive models, NLP solutions, and AI-powered automation.


📈 Aligning data insights with executive decision-making.


🤖 Creating workflow automation solutions that save time & costs.


📊 Designing interactive dashboards for self-serve insights.







🚀 AI for Business📊 Interactive Analytics💡 Future of Work🌍 Social Impact Analytics



Developing AI-driven assistants for decision-making

Exploring LLMs & RAG models for enterprise automation




Creating real-time dashboards

Enabling self-serve analytics for stakeholders




Exploring automation’s impact on jobs

How AI can enhance productivity




Using data-driven insights to optimize healthcare outcomes

Improving nonprofit analytics & funding strategies









💡 A tool that helps nonprofits craft stronger grant applications.
🛠️ Tech: NLP, AI-driven summarization
🔗 See More


📊 A dynamic analytics tool for healthcare providers.
🛠️ Tech: Python, SQL, Tableau
🔗 Explore

🛠️ Tech: R, Python, Databricks
🔗 Read More

📩 Let’s Connect: LinkedIn | Contact Me
I’m passionate about solving complex problems by combining data-driven insights, technical/business acumen, and a collaborative spirit. Whether it’s building scalable solutions or empowering teams to achieve their best, I thrive at the intersection of strategy, technology, and teamwork.
## **🔹 What Defines My Work?** | **Expertise** | **How I Apply It** | |————————-|——————| | **Data Science & AI** | Building predictive models, automation solutions, and AI-powered tools. | | **Business Strategy** | Aligning analytics with executive decision-making to drive innovation. | | **Product Innovation** | Designing and launching data-driven products that enhance efficiency. | | **Process Automation** | Developing solutions that reduce manual effort and optimize workflows. | | **Data Visualization** | Crafting interactive dashboards that drive insight-driven decisions. |




I am passionate about **blending analytics with innovation**, always exploring new ways to **push the boundaries of AI, automation, and strategic decision-making**.
🎯 **What I’m Currently Exploring:** - **🚀 AI for Business:** How **LLMs and RAG models** can enhance decision-making. - **📊 Interactive Analytics:** Developing **real-time, self-serve analytics tools**. - **💡 Future of Work:** How **data, AI, and automation** will shape the next-gen workforce. - **🌍 Social Impact Analytics:** Using data-driven insights to improve **nonprofit and healthcare outcomes**.




🔹 [**Projects**](projects.qmd) → See how I apply innovation to real-world problems. 🔹 [**Insights**](blog.qmd) → Read my thoughts on AI, analytics, and business strategy. 🔹 [**About Me**](about.qmd) → Learn about my background and leadership philosophy.









📩 If you would like to collaborate on a project together or chat more, contact me here LinkedIn or reach out via my Contact Me page.! 🚀

title: About Me
text:
I am a healthcare and finance analytics leader with 4+ years of experience in data analysis, AI, product innovation, and business strategy.


✔ Lead Innovation – Driving analytics-driven product development & business solutions.
✔ Build AI Solutions – Developing automation, predictive models, and data-driven decision tools.
✔ Strategic Thinking – Bridging technology, analytics, and executive decision-making.



Started as a data analyst → Built an innovations team → Now shaping future-focused analytics strategies.
